name: Glory of Speed: Race Champion
description:
Keep your eyes straight on road and your champion driver instincts sharp because Chain Car Racing doesn’t give you the chance to defeat your rivals glory easily. Be careful about when to punch the speed pedal and when to slow down facing xtreme and real city road and obstacles.

OXO Games Studio brings to you a unique chained car racing experience and learning xtreme driver skills. Keep your wits about you as the game demands a high level focus for avoiding real road obstacles and become the ultimate chain car racing champion.

FEATURES:
• Be ready to speed drive and slow down at any moment to avoid road obstacles
• The game requires xtreme driver and unique driving skills
• Don’t let your chain break, drive carefully
• Chain Racing is not just about speed, control your car speed to match your partner’s chained car
• Smooth and highly responsive controls
• Real-Like chain break Physics
• Stunning HD Graphics
• Free to play forever
• Explosive Racing music and sound effects
• No In-App Purchases
• No Wi-Fi required
and much more…
